document_metadata.title: Of Reynaert the Fox: Text and facing translation of Van den vos Reynaerde

questions: In Of Reynaert the Fox: Text and facing translation of Van den vos Reynaerde, the subject of inquiry is the Van den vos Reynaerde. What is the main point of the authors? What are the entities that take part in the discourse?

What do Bouwman and Besamusca think about the real identity of the author of the Van den vos Reynaerde, sometimes known as 'Reynaertdichter' (nickname for the Reynaert poet in Dutch)? What do they say about their biography, and the context of the creation of the poem?
How do Bouwman and Besamusca substantiate their claims? What proofs do they provide? Which techniques do they use? What is the degree of certainty?
